description: This file defines a React-like component for a hero section in a Qwik application, including static content, styling, and a confetti animation on button click.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Higher-order function from Qwik to define a reactive component.

methods.name: loadConfetti
methods.description: Dynamically loads the confetti script and resolves with the confetti function.

methods.name: shoot
methods.description: Triggers a confetti burst with predefined defaults.
